entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
